articles.title: LeBron continues dominance, U.S. edges Germany - ESPN India
articles.description: LeBron James put on another display of dominance Monday night, leading the United States to a 92-88 victory over Germany in London, finishing with 20 points, 6 rebounds and 4 assists against the current FIBA World Cup champion.
